name: Shoot out Basketball Mania
description:
This is the most amazing and addictive Arcade Basketball real game-play.


3 Different Game Modes
Arcade: You got 60 seconds to make as many baskets as you can
3 pointers: You got 60 seconds to make the 2 and 3 pointers, the board moves backward and forward. (requires upgrade)
Addictive: A mix between the 2 previous modes.(requires upgrade)

Local scoring boards.
Help & Info section
game options: We created amazing music and sound effects, you can manage it form here.Enjoy..
